attributes.action: call a general election when a Prime Minister steps down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A mid term Prime Ministerial change will allow a minister with minimal mandate from the people of the UK to have a high level power to govern and represent the uk. If a Prime Minister either resigns or can no longer execute the role a general election should be called.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
